name: Akrysolv® 2060 XS-50
description: Akrysolv® 2060 XS-50 is used for Air-drying products and 2 K PUR systems for Metal Protection. It is dedicated to the production of two-component polyurethane products and one-component acrylic enamels and paints. Compared to conventional alkyds, they feature better resistance and decorative properties. Their production is based on an optimized recipe, which allows us to obtain products with a high performance quality, perfectly adapted to the needs and expectations.
